price: (Dan Allah berfirman), "Hai Adam bertempat tinggallah kamu dan istrimu di surga serta makanlah olehmu berdua (buah-buahan) di mana saja yang kamu sukai, dan janganlah kamu berdua mendekati pohon ini, lalu menjadilah kamu berdua termasuk orang-orang yang zalim".
arabic: وَيَٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسۡكُنۡ أَنتَ وَزَوۡجُكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ فَكُلَا مِنۡ حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمَا وَلَا تَقۡرَبَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayāādamu us'kun anta wazawjuka al-janata fakulā min ḥaythu shi'tumā walā taqrabā hādhihi al-shajarata fatakūnā mina al-ẓālimīna
